name: Guinea Pig Babe Demo
description:
Not long ago, humanity has successfully connected Earth to another planet. There, we met an advanced civilization of creatures that look exactly like our guinea pigs. Fortunately, they are peaceful creatures and are able to communicate with humans. In order to get to know each other better, we agreed to establish an experimental school on the borderline called XXX Highschool. And this is where I will be spending my highschool life!

Thank you for playing! Any comments would be highly appreciated!
